pf.matcher.implementations.functional
Class FunctionalMatcher

java.lang.Object
  pf.matcher.implementations.functional.FunctionalMatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMatcher
public class FunctionalMatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMatcher

This class implements a functional matcher based on Pallouci's works.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Rodrigo Almeida de Amorim

Method that verify if the parameters have the same source/Ontology.

Parameters:
requestParameter - - A request parameter.
serviceParameter - - A service parameter.
Returns:
true/false - return true if the sources are the same and false if they are different.

- return an ArrayList with all correspondences matched.

matcher

public void matcher(java.util.ArrayList<Service> services,
                    Query request)
Method that has to be implemented due the interface. It manager all the methods in the class FunctionalMatcher.

Specified by:
matcher in interface IMatcher
Parameters:
services - - An ArrayList with all services loaded.
request - - A Query with data from request loaded.
